amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement guidance FIN-2014-G001 (relating to BSA Expectations Regarding Marijuana-Related Businesses) issued on February 14, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement guidance FIN-2014-G001 (relating to BSA Expectations Regarding Marijuana-Related Businesses) issued on February 14, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 236 (Roll no. 415).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Fleming.
